channel.title: Moparscape.org is not a Learning Community Any More! Vote!
channel.description:
[b]No spamming. This means making useless polls, unnessecary posts, and posting in Capital letters. If you do this there is a 95% you will be ignored. [/b]----ONE OF THE RULES ADMINS,MODS IF IT IS YOUR CHOICE TO IGNORE THIS. THEN DO IT.
[center][size=20pt]Learning Community OR NOT[/size][/center]
I personaly think this whole forums is turning into CRAP. First it's been client hacking now its tutorials. Scripts, barley anyone posts on it before you know it this forums is gonna be a spamming community.In the Development and Help no one will help you unless they have nothing else to do. I just think they need to go back to moparisthebest.com so this community will turn back into a LEARNING COMMUNITY from which is first was.
Thanks~ Jon(R1ch kid)
Please Post Feedback!
[b]This is not a usless poll this is a Vote.[/b]
